title: Timepiece Smart Watch Face
summary: Visual Appeal,  Utility and Readability for Your Android Wear Smart Watch
description: NOW SUPPORTING HIGH RESOLUTION WATCHES (Huawei and others)Treat your smart watch to this visually appealing, and practically useful watch face. Fitting especially on watches with round face, e.g. Moto 360, it looks also good on rectangular faces (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smartwatch 3).Enhancing on a classic design, on top of clarity and readability, it gives you:- Three options for calendars/date display- Weekday- moon phase- current temperature (needs internet connection)- Moon post- Ambient Mode Support- Four themes ( Silver, Black, Black Plus & Gold) - Re-sizable widget on mobile.And that is not the end of it watch for the new customization options and features coming soon, and we'd love to hear from you what you would like to see on it!(Note: After installing app on your mobile wait for about 30 seconds while system copies watch face to your smartwatch, then change watch face on your Android Wear to Timepiece)
descriptionHTML:
NOW SUPPORTING HIGH RESOLUTION WATCHES (Huawei and others)

Treat your smart watch to this visually appealing, and practically useful watch face. Fitting especially on watches with round face, e.g. Moto 360, it looks also good on rectangular faces (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smartwatch 3).

Enhancing on a classic design, on top of clarity and readability, it gives you:

- Three options for calendars/date display
- Weekday
- moon phase
- current temperature (needs internet connection)
- Moon post
- Ambient Mode Support
- Four themes ( Silver, Black, Black Plus & Gold)
- Re-sizable widget on mobile.

And that is not the end of it watch for the new customization options and features coming soon, and we'd love to hear from you what you would like to see on it!

(Note: After installing app on your mobile wait for about 30 seconds while system copies watch face to your smartwatch, then change watch face on your Android Wear to Timepiece)
comments: Excellent watch face with all the information displayed,on my Huawei watch it looks good.
Apps not functioning Please help its not working..after install there is only one watch face and no button to apply the watch face to my moto360.

My favorite Watch Face! I really like this watch face. I spent almost an afternoon looking at watch faces for my Moto 360 and so far I like this one the best. Lots of interesting options. And with the latest update the temperature is now working on my watch, thanks to developer's quick fix! I would still like to see additional face colors. But the golden one is lovely. üëç
Very nice How about square face for my asus zenwatch? Otherwise 5 star.üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü
But I have an lg g watch and this is the only face I've seen with a lunar part and the aspect ratio is off :-( pls add some support so it will fit in my box pls
Not as advertised. Has prayer times embedded in it.
recentChanges: - Support for high resolution watches ( Huawei Watch and others)
- Now you can select watch faces from Android Wear app or directly on smartwatch.
- Fixed refresh problem in ambient mode (v1.04)
